attributes.action: Stop the wasteful spending of public funds on unneccessary items
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At a time when the country is in financial meltdown due to lack of funds I cannot see why we should be wasting money on such objects as the tees valley giants and the teminos £15 million, marsyas, turbine hall in london £250.000 Then a further fortune to be paid to mr. anish kapoor for creating his biggest art yet for the 2012 olympics mr Kapoor does not need the money, his company made £17 million during 2008 and these funds would go a long way to easing the burden on the ex equitable life pensioners let down by the financial services authority before any more of them die off, or is that what you are waiting for.
